name: Canyon Cruiser
overview: You are the pilot of a new spaceship. You must tet the craft to its limits. You can fly along the canyon and through the space maze. The ship will change color to warn of changes in the canyon size. At teh end of your flight you will be ranked. You must not hit the sides of the canyon, but asteroids will fly by. Good luck! Published as part of the "Star Fighter" game pack, COMPUTE!'s Gazette 1984/01 (Issue #07) / no definite name, game says "64-Canyon".
